item.description:
Meetup.com is based in NYC and is asking folks to add relief efforts to Meetups when they can.

I'm going to make a donation to the Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund and if anyone else wishes to join in, I can take donations of cash, checks and even securely swipe credits cards on my cellphone (thanks to Square.com) for whatever amount you want to donate, no $10 minimum, since it'll be one big donation in our group's name.

My brother is currently hip deep in waders, trying to get NYC schools back up and running!  Please help if you can, if not, that's ok too, thanks! :-)

Its a 3 day weekend, so let's sing and dance Sunday night!  Karaoke with DJ Ed starts nice and early at 8:00. (most places are 9 :-)

Early enough for a late dinner if anyone wants it.

Always a great time here, whether its DJ Ed, the music, dancing or the food.

Be there or be square. ;-)

 

Tom D'A c603-521-8392
item.name: 3 day weekend! Princeton Station for Red Cross Disaster Relief & karaoke/dancing
